import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; export default function ForgotPassword() { const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email address').required('Email is required') }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: '', }, validationSchema, onSubmit: values => { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }, }) return (

Enter email to reset password

Send me back to{' '} Login

) };
